mapper.insert: insert into payment( success, imp_uid, merchant_uid, pay_method, pg_provider, pg_type, error_msg, payment_cd, order_no, product_cd, giveaway_cd, payment, payment_type_cd )values ( #{success}, #{imp_uid}, #{merchant_uid}, #{pay_method}, #{pg_provider}, #{pg_type}, #{error_msg}, #{payment_cd}, #{order_no}, #{product_cd}, #{giveaway_cd}, #{payment}, #{payment_type_cd} )
